content: wear your hand-knit socks all year round with these cute and frilly ankle socks perfect for pairing with sneakers or loafers to dress up your bare legs these socks start with a folded picot hem and are then worked in a decreasing lace pattern to create a ruffled detail after the lace chart has been completed a short row is worked to change the direction of the knitting so the rest of the sock can be worked right side out a 2x2 rib pattern is worked through the ankle to support the frill then the rest of the sock is completed with a german short row heel and toe the nita socks are best made in your favorite fingering weight/4ply sock yarn they have been written to be worked using the magic loop technique and can be worked two at a time if you prefer difficulty level intermediate size 7 8 9 10 to fit foot circumference 7in 8in 9in 10in 17 5cm 20cm 22 5cm 25cm
